name: MangAdventure
description: A simple manga hosting CMS written in Django

DOMAIN.description: The domain name of the app.

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_USERNAME.description: The username of the superuser account.

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_EMAIL.description: The e-mail address of the superuser account.

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_PASSWORD.description: The password of the superuser account.

ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: A comma-separated list of allowed hosts.

LOGO_URL.description: The (PNG!) logo URL of the app.

MAIN_BG_COLOR.description: The main background color of the site.

MAIN_TEXT_COLOR.description: The main text color of the site.

ALTER_BG_COLOR.description: The alternate background color of the site.

ALTER_TEXT_COLOR.description: The alternate text color of the site.

SHADOW_COLOR.description: The shadow color of the site.

EMAIL_URL.description: See https://git.io/JD0y8 if you want to send e-mails.
